      • getParameterMap

        public Map<String,List<String>> getParameterMap(String encoding)
                                         throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Get a map of the query parameters in this exchange's request.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the name of a supported character encoding
        Returns:
        a map of the query parameter keys and value lists for this exchange's request, in the encoding given
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - If character encoding needs to be consulted, but named character encoding is not supported
        See Also:
        URLDecoder.decode(String, String)
